verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> [be] the LORD צוּרִ֗י <WH6697> my strength הַֽמְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> which teacheth יָדַ֣י <WH3027> my hands לַקְרָ֑ב <WH7128> to war אֶ֝צְבְּעוֹתַ֗י <WH676> [and] my fingers לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> to fight

חַסְדִּ֥י <WH2617> My goodness וּמְצוּדָתִי֮ <WH4686> and my fortress מִשְׂגַּבִּ֪י <WH4869> my high tower וּֽמְפַלְטִ֫י <WH6403> and my deliverer לִ֥י מָ֭גִנִּי <WH4043> my shield וּב֣וֹ חָסִ֑יתִי <WH2620> and [he] in whom I trust הָרוֹדֵ֖ד <WH7286> who subdueth עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> my people תַחְתָּֽי׃ <WH8478> under

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God מָה־ <WH4100> what אָ֭דָם <WH120> what [is] man וַתֵּדָעֵ֑הוּ <WH3045> that thou takest knowledge בֶּן־ <WH1121> of him [or] the son אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <WH376> that וַֽתְּחַשְּׁבֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2803> that thou makest account
אָ֭דָם <WH120> Man לַהֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> to vanity דָּמָ֑ה <WH1819> is like יָ֝מָ֗יו <WH3117> his days כְּצֵ֣ל <WH6738> [are] as a shadow עוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> that passeth away

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD הַט־ <WH5186> Bow שָׁמֶ֣יךָ <WH8064> thy heavens וְתֵרֵ֑ד <WH3381> and come down גַּ֖ע <WH5060> touch בֶּהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> the mountains וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <WH6225> and they shall smoke
בְּר֣וֹק <WH1299> Cast forth בָּ֭רָק <WH1300> lightning וּתְפִיצֵ֑ם <WH6327> and scatter שְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> them shoot out חִ֝צֶּ֗יךָ <WH2671> thine arrows וּתְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <WH2000> and destroy

שְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> Send יָדֶ֗יךָ <WH3027> thine hand מִמָּ֫ר֥וֹם <WH4791> from above פְּצֵ֣נִי <WH6475> rid וְ֭הַצִּילֵנִי <WH5337> me and deliver מִמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> me out of great מִ֝יַּ֗ד <WH3027> from the hand בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> children נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> of strange

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <WH6310> Whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <WH3225> and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> of falsehood

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> unto thee O God שִׁ֣יר <WH7891> I will sing חָ֭דָשׁ <WH2319> a new אָשִׁ֣ירָה <WH7892> song לָּ֑ךְ בְּנֵ֥בֶל <WH5035> upon a psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <WH6218> [and] an instrument of ten strings אֲזַמְּרָה־ <WH2167> will I sing praises לָּֽךְ׃

הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> [It is he] that giveth תְּשׁוּעָ֗ה <WH8668> salvation לַמְּלָ֫כִ֥ים <WH4428> unto kings הַ֭פּוֹצֶה <WH6475> who delivereth אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֥ד <WH1732> David עַבְדּ֗וֹ <WH5650> his servant מֵחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> sword רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> from the hurtful

פְּצֵ֥נִי <WH6475> Rid וְהַצִּילֵנִי֮ <WH5337> me and deliver מִיַּ֪ד <WH3027> me from the hand בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> children נֵ֫כָ֥ר <WH5236> of strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <WH6310> whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <WH3225> and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> of falsehood

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Let בָּנֵ֨ינוּ ׀ <WH1121> That our sons כִּנְטִעִים֮ <WH5195> [may be] as plants מְגֻדָּלִ֪ים <WH1431> grown up בִּֽנְעוּרֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <WH5271> in their youth בְּנוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <WH1323> [that] our daughters כְזָוִיֹּ֑ת <WH2106> [may be] as corner stones מְ֝חֻטָּב֗וֹת <WH2404> polished תַּבְנִ֥ית <WH8403> [after] the similitude הֵיכָֽל׃ <WH1964> of a palace

מְזָוֵ֣ינוּ <WH4200> [That] our garners מְלֵאִים֮ <WH4392> [may be] full מְפִיקִ֥ים <WH6329> affording מִזַּ֗ן <WH2177> every אֶ֫ל־ <WH413> about זַ֥ן <WH2177> kind צֹאונֵ֣נוּ <WH6629> [that] our sheep מַ֭אֲלִיפוֹת <WH503> may bring forth thousands מְרֻבָּב֗וֹת <WH7231> and ten thousands בְּחוּצוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH2351> in our streets

אַלּוּפֵ֗ינוּ <WH441> [That] our oxen מְֽסֻבָּ֫לִ֥ים <WH5445> [may be] strong to labour אֵֽין־ <WH369> Without פֶּ֭רֶץ <WH6556> [that there be] no breaking in וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and without יוֹצֵ֑את <WH3318> nor going out וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no צְ֝וָחָ֗ה <WH6682> that [there be] no complaining בִּרְחֹבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH7339> in our streets

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Happy הָ֭עָם <WH5971> [is that] people שֶׁכָּ֣כָה <WH3602> that is in such a case לּ֑וֹ אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> [yea] happy הָ֝עָ֗ם <WH5971> [is that] people שֶׁיֲהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> whose God
